title: Rent the home you want to buy!
posting_body: How It Works:
Get Approved
Start your journey home with a quick and free prequalification form and see if the program is right for you!
Then, apply with no impact on your credit (soft pull).​ One time application fee of $75 per household.
2. Find a Home You Love
Search for a home listed for sale.
Work with an experienced licensed REALTOR.
You see the rents and purchase prices upfront, so there are no surprises (property qualification criteria apply).
Pet friendly!
They Buy the Home
The real estate company makes a cash offer on the home of your choice.
They operate in 57+ metro areas across America.
If the offer is accepted, you sign a 1-year lease and get ready to move in.
Rent and Decide
Enjoy your new home with the peace of mind of 5 years of guaranteed renting.
You can buy your home at any point.
At the end of your lease term, you can renew, or simply walk away with no penalties.
Homes in the greater Seattle (Tacoma/Olympia) metro area generally rent for $2500- $3500 per month.
Available properties must meet certain criteria to qualify and be move-in ready.
-Annual household income of at least $78,000
-Proof of income
-Minimum credit score of 580
-No open chapter 7 bankruptcy
-No disqualifying criminal history
-Minimum of 45 days from date of application to move-in
-Purchase price of home cannot exceed $650,000
Contact me today for more information and details about the program!
Amanda Marques
~Broker
Coldwell Banker Bain
**Homes in pictures are not actual rentals but examples of the many options in our local market***
